patterns.name: max_attempts
patterns.regex: ^(?P<timestamp>\w{3}\s+\d+\s[0-9:]+)\s+(?P<hostname>\S+)\s+sshd\[(?P<pid>\d+)\]:\s+error: maximum authentication attempts exceeded for (?:invalid user )?(?P<username>\S+) from (?P<ip>[0-9\.]+) port (?P<port>\d+)

patterns.name: disconnect_too_many
patterns.regex: ^(?P<timestamp>\w{3}\s+\d+\s[0-9:]+)\s+(?P<hostname>\S+)\s+sshd\[(?P<pid>\d+)\]:\s+Disconnecting authenticating user (?P<username>\S+)\s+(?P<ip>[0-9\.]+) port (?P<port>\d+): Too many authentication failures
